Description:
Flora Hill Unit is a Winner
Everybody loves a winner and this brick veneer unit has all the hallmarks of success.
Starting with the unbeatable Flora Hill location – set in a quiet development within walking distance from the city, Strath and Kennington Village shopping centres and Latrobe University with a bus stop across the street for non-walkers.
Then there's size – it offers three good-sized bedrooms (all with robes), two bathrooms, spacious lounge with bay window and roomy meals area adjoining the kitchen. The single garage has a personal access door to the dwelling plus a handy fully-lined storage/study/work room located at the end.
Internal inclusions are ducted air conditioning, gas heating and cooking while outside the maintenance-free, paved rear yard has convenient gated side access.
Don't overlook this ideal first-buy or retirement home. Alternatively, it is a textbook investment property with a proven rental history (current rental appraisal $290-$300 per week).
Live in or let it out, this one has the sweet smell of success.

Description:
MARVELLOUS MARNIE ROAD LOCATION
Surrounded by soul-soothing seclusion, this family-orientated property nestled under the trees on a big block approximately 1475 square metres is a mecca for birdlife.
Imagine waking up to the sound of the breeze in the trees and the birds singing before going for a walk or run around Kennington Reservoir and picking up a coffee on the way home. Or take the kids and dogs for a walk through the bushy slopes of One Tree Hill Regional Park.
Located at the quiet end of Marnie Road, this one-of-a kind property is within walking distance to everything a family needs â?? Strath and Kennington Village shopping, kinder, primary and secondary schools and the university.
The home offers four good-sized bedrooms, two fully renovated bathrooms, large lounge, casual living, dining and study areas around the remodelled kitchen. The hub of the home, the kitchen is equipped with Bosch appliances, dishwasher, granite overlay bench tops, pantry and loads of storage.
Every room enjoys serene garden views while the family living area opens to a covered timber alfresco deck - the ideal place to kick back while the kids splash about in the custom-made, solar-heated Guseli pool or use the play equipment of the adjoining Marnie Road play space.
The large block includes bitumen driveways to double garage, Colorbond workshop and garden shed with oodles of room for caravans, boats, trailers etc. while a recently installed auto sprinkler system takes care of the garden.
Brilliant inside and out, this property is low on maintenance, high on lifestyle.

Description:
THE PERFECT LOCATION
This large 4 bedroom family home is situated in one of Bendigo's most sought after locations. On a large allotment of approx. 700 sq metres, & set behind a nice high private fence with automatic gates, you will feel at home as soon as you step inside. Lovely “Spotted Gum” timber floors flow throughout the home between the various living & entertaining zones within. Centrally located, the newly installed kitchen has granite benchtops, Bosch dishwasher & a 900mm Westinghouse stove with gas hotplates & electric oven which will excite the chef within us all. From the kitchen, the meals area, lounge room & rear living rooms are all easily accessed allowing family to socialise together or separately depending on the gathering being held. Accessed from the covered entertaining area, the rear living room is perfect for the purchasers wishing to operate a home office as this room is private & secure being cordoned off from the rest of the home by concertina doors. The lounge room & main bedroom both enjoy beautiful natural light from the north-east aspect while the main bedroom has access through his/hers walk in robe to the modern ensuite. Ducted evaporative cooling & a gas heater ensure year round comfort no matter the season. In the rear yard, the shed/workshop is perfect for the owner wishing to continue their hobby away from the main residence. Both children & pets will love the safe yard. Being only metres from Strath Village Shopping precinct & on a bus route to the Bendigo CBD, this property is perfect for the family looking for the convenience of being able to walk to & from the shops. Walking distance to Kennington Primary School, La Trobe University & Bendigo South East College, this is the perfect home for families, investors or even parents wishing to stop paying rent for their children at University. The house provides low maintenance living & a short stroll to nearby fitness centres, Lake Reservoir and Brennan park swimming centre. Cafes & restaurants are also located at the door step. Walkable distance to medical centre & other medical services.
Highlights:
-Spotted Gum flooring throughout the house.
-Newly renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtop, soft close drawers & open plan dining.
-Luxurious kitchen island with 40mm engineered stone containing waterfall feature.
-Renovated Bathroom & Ensuite with frameless showers, wall faced toilets, vanities & tiles.
-Tinted windows in lounge room & main bedroom for privacy & comfort.
-Solarhart roof top solar hot water with electric backup.
-Newly painted roof, gutter and trims.
-Rejuvenated patio freshly painted with new roofing.
-Backyard with established hedges for privacy.
-Modern brick fence with merbau slats and automated gate for safety and privacy.
-Low maintenance front yard with established Sir Walter buffalo grass lawn.

This beautifully maintained rendered brick home offers character, quality and comfort in a very central Strathdale location. This quality build was part of a unique birchgrove development which has lost none of its modern appeal.
